snippet: Durant, who won his fourth N.B.A. scoring title in five years, averaging 32 points a game, led the voting; he was followed by the Heat’s LeBron James and the Clippers’ Blake Griffin.
lead_paragraph: Durant, who won his fourth N.B.A. scoring title in five years, averaging 32 points a game, led the voting; he was followed by the Heat’s LeBron James and the Clippers’ Blake Griffin.

headline.main: Thunder’s Kevin Durant Wins His First M.V.P. Award
headline.print_headline: Thunder's Kevin Durant wins first MVP award
